Stixbox Function

NOM

    loddsinv - inverse of log odd

SEQUENCE D'APPEL

p = loddsinv(z,b)

DESCRIPTION

    Compute the inverse of log odds. The function is equal to 1/(1+exp(-u)) with

  • u = z if only one input argument is given
  • u = z*b if size(z,2) = length(b)
  • u = z*b(1:n-1) + b(n) if size(z,2) < length(b)
